Andy Whittall
Ryde, England, United Kingdom
awhittall@hotmail.com 	  07787653578         linkedin.com/in/andywhittall/
Summary
A successful Sales Director with a strong background in the Channel and both major Vendor and Distributor experience. With time in Direct Sales, Sales team management and Business Development roles, I am a high achiever and lead from the front.
Currently working with Cylance Cyber Security (Now BlackBerry) as the distribution Sales Leader for EMEA and with an individual contributor role across the UK, Middle East, Africa, Turkey and Israel.
After 8 years with IBM Software Group in EMEA Leadership roles and Channel Management positions I moved to TechData to manage the vendor relationship and develop sales in their Hewlett Packard Enterprise business across 23 count Andy Whittall
Ryde, England, United Kingdom
awhittall@hotmail.com 	  07787653578         linkedin.com/in/andywhittall/
Summary
A successful Sales Director with a strong background in the Channel and both major Vendor and Distributor experience. With time in Direct Sales, Sales team management and Business Development roles, I am a high achiever and lead from the front.
Currently working with Cylance Cyber Security (Now BlackBerry) as the distribution Sales Leader for EMEA and with an individual contributor role across the UK, Middle East, Africa, Turkey and Israel.
After 8 years with IBM Software Group in EMEA Leadership roles and Channel Management positions I moved to TechData to manage the vendor relationship and develop sales in their Hewlett Packard Enterprise business across 23 countries in EMEA. I also manage the relationships with strategic Alliance Partners. Blending large vendor experience with distribution has proved productive and enables me to bring a greater depth of understanding, insight and strategic objectivity to the role.
Key words
Cyber Security Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning end point protection Big Data & Analytics Internet of Things Performance Development Channel Development Relationship Management Channel Sales Mobility Vendor Alliances Distributor Relations Solution Sales DDOS Mitigation Use Data Science Grow Market Share Sales Team Management Software Sales Complex Sales Cycles Channel Management Enterprise Storage Cloud computing Reseller Development Solution Selling AI MDF Management Strategic Partnerships Accurate Forecasting VAR Recruitment Contract Negotiation Account Development & Retention Exceeding Revenue Targets Distribution experience Networking SaaS Enablement Programs IoT Business Strategy Alliances Marketing integration Predictive Analytics Middle East Africa EMEA
Experience
BlackBerry - Distribution Sales Director UK&I, Middle East, Turkey, Africa & Israel.
Jan 2020 - Present (1 year 1 month +)
Responsible for the profitable growth of the BlackBerry Cylance Distributor and Partner network across the UK, Middle East, Africa, Turkey and Israel. As well as managing a small team covering northern, central and Eastern Europe. I have designed and implemented a Distributor rationalisation program for EMEA and recruitment of new partnerships for the African market. Responsible for achieving the growth targets across the region, enabling and motivating the channel to gain the best possible business outcomes.
EMEA Business Development Manager - Hewlett Packard Enterprise Tech Data
Nov 2015 - Jan 2020 (4 years 3 months)
Create and execute business development and client acquisition strategy for this global IT solutions provider with revenue of over $36bn. Cultivated a network of partners and customers to provide complex business services and resources. Spearheaded the delivery of Europe-wide business expansion initiatives worth in excess of $500m. Collaboration with numerous internal and external stakeholders to achieve project deliverables.
EMEA Distributor Sales Leader/Inside Sales Leader/ Routes to Market Manager IBM
Jan 2007 - Jan 2015 (8 years 1 month)
Distributor Sales Leader – Europe, Central & Eastern Europe, 2013 - 2015 Leadership and strategic oversight for the continual growth of sales revenue across the region. Managed internal teams and distribution partners to secure future business. ✰ Growth if 140% following an intensive sales and client acquisition program. ✰ Successfully implemented sales and operational policies to drive consistency, efficiency, and profitability.   Inside Sales Leader – Europe – Information Management & Big Data, 2012 - 2013 Information Management and Big Data team, implemented sophisticated business transformation projects involving a Pan-European Telesales operation spread across 20 countries. ✰ Led the hiring, on-boarding, and training of new managers to ramp up team activity within tight deadlines. ✰ Achieved a range of ambitious operational and financial targets   Routes to Market Manager – Information Management & Big Data, 2011 - 2012 Identification and roll out of alternative income streams to complement direct sales operations. ✰ Outst

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
